message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I'm willing to start with a price of $900000, which is a fair and competitive price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000. It's a fair price considering the value it brings to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product, which is the same as my initial offer. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I'm not willing to go back to your initial offer of $850000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $880000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $860000 for the product. I hope we can find a compromise at this price.

I'm not willing to meet you halfway again, Bob. I've already made concessions and I need to prioritize my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000, which is the same price I initially offered. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
